content:
332fdaaf9b0b4c0c96b7e8f4d9fc18:
  'Skill-Description': Informs users about the process and benefits of getting
    vaccinated.
  'Attribute':
    4db9735eea014ed591fe1869101ae8:
      'Slot-Description': The number and frequency of doses required for the vaccine.
    67e35498bee243b3be2a9c7ce4b438:
      'Slot-Description': The specific virus for which vaccination information is
        being sought.
    6ea0f0ec0e7f4355baa36e63c08a56:
      'Slot-Description': The efficacy of the vaccine in preventing the virus.
    7d24f690e57141ec9c57614ce127ee:
      'Slot-Description': The type of vaccine, such as mRNA, viral vector, or inactivated
        virus.
    814dea644d6f47c6a4ded4be981820:
      'Slot-Description': The current status of the vaccine, such as approved, emergency
        use authorization, or in clinical trials.
    c0fd16dcda434cf29cde94106633d5:
      'Slot-Description': Potential side effects of the vaccine.
    ca7b898e693a4db5ad611071b7ac74:
      'Slot-Description': The name of the vaccine for the specified virus.
91e387a6b9684356924366e5af34cb:
  'Skill-Description': This intent allows users to adjust their spending limits
    for different categories in their budget.
  'Attribute':
    09ea0517c3724d3fa8ea1e9bddfe96:
      'Slot-Description': The type of budget category to adjust.
      'Slot-Example-values':
      - food
      - housing
      - utilities
      - transportation
      - healthcare
      - entertainment
      - personal
      - savings
    22a2760577bd43d8a7a6c367390d74:
      'Slot-Description': The amount to increase or decrease the budget limit by.
    fbb7f3c54bdd468f9eb7534f521cd6:
      'Slot-Description': The direction to adjust the budget limit.
      'Slot-Example-values':
      - increase
      - decrease
93b80f16999e40aeb96740f342e699:
  'Skill-Description': Discusses the process and logistics of distributing the
    vaccine.
  'Attribute':
    6d700fcea9d945c1beb54845a530bc:
      'Slot-Description': The location where the vaccine is being distributed.
    7849424001a442d98519d46a9ceafc:
      'Slot-Description': The type of vaccine being distributed.
    deaf4832bbbd477884bd046a9fe0a8:
      'Slot-Description': The population group receiving the vaccine.
      'Slot-Example-values':
      - healthcare workers
      - older adults
      - essential workers
      - general public
dd73f301408c4506aab04004d78ccd:
  'Skill-Description': This intent enables users to generate predictions about
    their future spending based on past trends.
  'Attribute':
    3694f135220447c3a72b56aa377d1b:
      'Slot-Description': The time period for which the expenses will be predicted.
    ae568bcf004644329ab7600b7851fc:
      'Slot-Description': The category of the expense to be predicted.
e3fba45503a04512b674173edcd975:
  'Skill-Description': Explains the origin and transmission methods of the virus.
  'Attribute':
    2fba4dcb16d941e188cc458abc6782:
      'Slot-Description': The specific virus being discussed.
      'Slot-Example-values':
	- Influenza (flu)
	- Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV)
	- Hepatitis viruses (HAV, HBV, HCV)
	- Herpes simplex virus
	
    9e32fe8656b941129fa5cfbd7c8ad0:
      'Slot-Description': The ways the virus can be transmitted from person to person.
 'Slot-Example-values':
	- Droplet transmission
	- Indirect contact
	- Sexual transmission
    ea809f23f05f40b8bfa9030ece8183:
      'Slot-Description': The symptoms caused by the virus.
      'Slot-Example-values':
      - fever
      - cough
      - shortness of breath
      - fatigue
      - muscle or body aches
      - headache
      - new loss of taste or smell
      - sore throat
      - congestion or runny nose
      - nausea or vomiting
      - diarrhea

You are a system that categorizes incoming queries.
You are provided with the list of intents. Your task will be to classify the given user inquiry. I also want you to extract all relevant slots for the chosen intent.
	• Each intent has a unique ID associated with it in alphanumeric format and  a description.
If no intent can be identified, please return: {“prediction_intent”: “none _of_the_above”}.

	• For each intent there are also slots associated with them. Those are unique values that need to be retrieved for a particular intent. Each slot has a unique slot-Id and Slot-Description, it may also include "'Slot-Example-values'", which means the slot must match one of the provided values. If multiple slots are provided, fill all the slots. If a  slot value is not provided, set the value of the slot to "missing".

Use the following format for your response:
<intent_id1>: 
   - slot1_id: <slot_id1> 
     slot1_value: <slot1_value> 
   - slot2_id: <slot_id2> 
     slot2_value: <slot2_value> 

Query:
*What are the different routes through which the virus Covid- 19 can be  transmitted ?*

chosen:
<e3fba45503a04512b674173edcd975>: 
   - slot1_id: <2fba4dcb16d941e188cc458abc6782> 
     slot1_value: <missing> 
   - slot2_id: <9e32fe8656b941129fa5cfbd7c8ad0> 
     slot2_value: <missing> 
   - slot3_id: <ea809f23f05f40b8bfa9030ece8183> 
     slot3_value: <missing>
